name: Address
description: Base Address object used as billing address in a payment or extended for Shipping Address.

line1.description: Line 1 of the Address (eg. number, street, etc).

line2.description: Optional line 2 of the Address (eg. suite, apt #, etc.).

postal_code.description: Zip code or equivalent is usually required for countries that have them. For list of countries that do not have postal codes please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Postal_code.

state.description: 2 letter code for US states, and the equivalent for other countries.
